title: Developing by definite a better organization structure following job description and job specification for all position in Moy Fa Restaurant to increase customer satisfaction
abstract: This dissertation is written as a final part of traineeship in order to developed better organizational structure with clear job description and job specification to increase customer satisfaction in Moy Fa Restaurant. Quality research has been conducted. This qualitative research is divided into 7 (seven) parts. The first part is about the proposal, the proposal consists of: 1. INTRODUCTION TO THE TOPIC 2. PROBLEM STATEMENT 3. RESEARCH QUESTION 4. THE DELIMITATION AND LIMITATION 5. METHOD AND JUSTIFICATION OF METHOD The second part introduces the problem. It shows that for stalling thesis, first the problem faced by Moy Fa has to be stated clearly. The writers are going to explain about 1. THE OLD ORGANIZATION STRUCTURE SYSTEM OF MOY FA RESTAURANT. 2. THE PROBLEM THAT IS FACED BY MOY FA RESTAURANT BECAUSE OF HAVING NO CLEAR ORGANIZATION STRUCTURE, JOB DESCRIPTION AND JOB SPECIFICATION. The third part is about Moy Fa restaurant, including its histoiy in general in this HORECA business and also it is important to know before problems occurred. The writers are going to start with: 1. THE PROFILE OF MOY FA RESTAURANT 2. THE INTRODUCTION OF MOY FA RESTAURANT 3. THE HISTORY OF MOY FA RESTAURANT 4. MOY FA PERSONNEL
source: Undergraduate Thesis No. 02010153/HTL/2004; Franky Njoto (33499151), Eka Mariana (33499159)
